post.html:
Database Setup

The fastest and easiest way to setup a Psql DB if you don't already have one is to use a hosted one.

Checkout Railway to setup a free one. Either way, you'll need the connection string. Inside your .env file, add your DB connection string

DATABASE_URL="your-connection-string"

We can then initialize a prisma project with: npx prisma init

Prisma VSCode Extension

The Prisma VSCode Extension adds syntax highlighting, formatting, auto-completion, jump-to-definition and linting for .prisma files.
post.title: Setup Db
